name: Provisions of parts III to XIV refer to vehicles upon the highways; exceptions
text:
RULES OF THE ROAD

PART III.  OBEDIENCE TO AND EFFECT OF TRAFFIC LAWS
     The provisions of parts III to XIV relating to the operation of vehicles refer exclusively to the operation of vehicles upon highways except, where a different place is specifically referred to in a given section. [L 1971, c 150, pt of §1]
